RoomIntro.beginning: This is the beginning of conversation.

MessageContentFallback.not_decrypted_yet: This message is not decrypted yet

follow_system.title: Follow system theme
follow_system.description: Use light or dark mode based on the system settings.

markdown.title: Markdown formatting
markdown.description: Format messages with markdown before sending

hide_membership_events.title: Hide membership events
hide_membership_events.description: Hide membership change messages from room timeline. (Join, Leave, Invite, Kick and Ban)

hide_nickname_avatar_events.title: Hide nick/avatar events
hide_nickname_avatar_events.description: Hide nickname and avatar change messages from the room timeline.

desktop.title: Desktop notifications
desktop.description: Show desktop notifications when new messages arrive.

sound.title: Notification sound
sound.description: Play a sound when new messages arrive.

export_encryption_keys.title: Export E2E room keys
export_encryption_keys.description: Export end-to-end encryption room keys to decrypt old messages in other session. In order to encrypt keys you need to set a password, which will be used while importing.

import_encryption_keys.title: Import E2E room keys
import_encryption_keys.description: To decrypt older messages, Export E2EE room keys from Element (Settings > Security & Privacy > Encryption > Cryptography) and import them here. Imported keys are encrypted so you\'ll have to enter the password you set in order to decrypt it.

dialog.title: Logout
dialog.description: Are you sure that you want to logout your session?

KeyBackup.restore_failed_bad_key: Failed to restore backup. Key is invalid!
KeyBackup.delete_key_backup_message: All encrypted message keys stored on the server will be permanently deleted.
KeyBackup.encrypted_messages_backup_description: Online backup your encrypted messages keys with your account data in case you lose access to your sessions. Your keys will be secured with a unique Security Key.
KeyBackup.encrypted_messages_backup_cross_signing_: Setup cross signing to backup your encrypted messages.

DeviceManage.setup_cross_signing_message: Setup cross signing in case you lose all your sessions
DeviceManage.logout_device_message: You are about to log out the session for {{device}}
DeviceManage.verify_this_session: Verify this session either with your Security Key/Phrase here or by initiating emoji verification from a verified session.
DeviceManage.verify_other_session: Verify other sessions by emoji verification or remove unfamiliar ones.
DeviceManage.session_name_privacy_message: Session names are visible to everyone, so do not put any private info here.

CrossSigning.title: Cross Signing
CrossSigning.setup_failed: Failed to setup cross signing. Please try again
CrossSigning.save_security_key_message: Please save this security key somewhere safe
CrossSigning.security_key_generation_message: We will generate a Security Key, which you can use to manage message backups and session verification.
CrossSigning.security_phrase_message: Alternatively you can set a 'Security Phrase' so you don't have to remember the long Security Key, and optionally save the key as a backup
CrossSigning.setup_message: Setup to verify and keep track of all your sessions. Also required to backup encrypted message.
CrossSigning.reset_keys_message: Anyone you have verified with will see security alerts and your message backup will lost. You almost certainly do not want to do this, unless you have lost Security Key or Phrase and every session you can cross-sign from.

RoomSettings.leave_room_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to leave {{room_name}}?
RoomSettings.notification_header: Notifications (Changing this will only affect you)

RoomCommon.drag_and_drop: Drag and drop files here or click for selection dialog

leave.title: Leave room
leave.subtitle: Are you sure you want to leave the {{room_name}} room?

default_role.name: Default role
default_role.description: Set default role for all members

send_messages.name: Send messages
send_messages.description: Set minimum power level to send messages in a room

reactions.name: Send reactions
reactions.description: Set minimum power level to send reactions in a room

delete.name: Delete messages sent by others
delete.description: Set minumum power level to delete messages in a room

notifications.name: Ping room
notifications.description: Set minimum power level to ping room

manage_rooms.name: Manage rooms in space
manage_rooms.description: Set minimum power level to manage rooms in space

invite.name: Invite
invite.description: Set minimum power level to invite members

kick.name: Kick
kick.description: Set minimum power level to kick members

ban.name: Ban
ban.description: Set minimum power level to ban members

change_avatar.name: Change avatar
change_avatar.description: Set minimum power level to change room/space avatar

change_name.name: Change name
change_name.description: Set minimum power evel to change room/space name

change_topic.name: Change topic
change_topic.description: Set minimum power level to change room/space topic

change_settings.name: Change settings
change_settings.description: Set minimum power level to change settings

change_published_address.name: Change published address
change_published_address.description: Set minimum power level to publish and set main address

change_permissions.name: Change permissions
change_permissions.description: Set minimum power level to change permissions

enable_room_encryption.name: Enable room encryption
enable_room_encryption.description: Set minimum power level to enable room encryption

change_history_visibility.name: Change history visibility
change_history_visibility.description: Set minimum power level to change room message history visibility

upgrade_room.name: Upgrade room
upgrade_room.description: Set minimum power level to upgrade room

pin_messages.name: Pin messages
pin_messages.description: Set minimum power level to pin messages in a room

change_acls.name: Change server ACLs
change_acls.description: Set minimum power level to change server ACLs

modify_widgets.name: Modify widgets
modify_widgets.description: Set minimum power level to modify room widgets

RoomProfile.remove_avatar_subtitle: Are you sure that you want to remove room avatar?
RoomProfile.permission_change_room_name: You have permission to change room name only
RoomProfile.permission_change_room_topic: You have permission to change room topic only
RoomProfile.permission_change_space_name: You have permission to change space name only
RoomProfile.permission_change_space_topic: You have permission to change space topic only

SpaceOptions.leave_space_confirmation: Are you sure that you want to leave the {{space}} space?

Auth.unable_to_connect: Unable to connect. Please check your input
Auth.bad_localpart_error: Username can only contain characters a-z, 0-9, or '=_-./'
Auth.user_id_too_long_error: Your user ID, including the hostname, can't be more than 255 characters long.
Auth.bad_password_error: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 non-alphanumeric character, 8-127 characters with no space.

terms_and_conditions.title: Agree with terms
terms_and_conditions.description: In order to complete registration, you need to agree to the terms and conditions.

validate_email.title: Verify email
validate_email.message: Please check your email <bold>{{email_address}}</bold> and validate before continuing further

captcha.message: Pleace check the box below to proceed

loading_messages.message_two: Looks like you have a lot of stuff to heat up!
